TopicTitle: Firespitter propeller plane and helicopter parts v7.1 (May 5th) for KSP 1.0

Articles.Content: Whats your computer stats

...computer stats
Stats?Elaborate.
Like what computer do you have...
It's a laptop,smaller ASUS(Kind of meant for work),but it's quite fast and runs KSP very well,even with a lot of mods.So,small ASUS laptop,but fast

- - - Updated - - -

32 bit game?
It supports 64 bit,but I use the 32 bit KSP because of some of the mods I use are not supported in 64 bit KSP.
Corrupted download?
No.There was no problem with the download.

Im going to be gone for a while. I'll be back. Soon.

- - - Updated - - -

Ok, now, what are your mods?
KW,B9,BD Armory,ATM,Boat Parts,Firespitter,DMagicOrbitalScience,Extended Hanger/VAB,Engineer,KSPInterstellar,KSO,Texture Replacer,Hot Rockets!,Universal Storage,and USI Kolinization Systems.
Do you have the most recent plugin?
There some in the Thread or you can get it from KAX mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-0-90-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-3-4 or any of RoverDude mods
I use the most recent one I could find on Github.
Wow, all your mods take a lot of data;Is it in the firespitter file?
Yeah,it is.I found it in the for release folder though in Firespitter master(The folder from the Github download.)
Try removing some mods out. Then run the game.(Like B9 and interstellar.)
I messed around with the folders,seeing if it worked.
Hope to see that work!
Seems to be working now!
Great! I'm done!

Not sure if this is the right place to ask, but since im working with the Firespitter plugin ill do it anyway:

I'm trying to modify an engine using Firespitter, i've done about 95% of what i want to do, but i've run into a problem, i'm trying to make a reverse thrust option using FSswitchEngineThrustTransform, but i want the reverse thrust to produce ~1/5 of the normal because having full reverse thrust on the engine i'm using makes no sense. It seems that the module does not allow you to limit thrust, nor can i figure out how to use MultiModeEngines to reverse thrust. Any suggestions?
